description: This week’s properties are in Spuyten Duyvil, Yorkville and Midtown.
title: Homes for Sale in the Bronx and Manhattan
title_page: Homes for Sale in the Bronx and Manhattan - The New York Times
maintext:
Click on the slide show to see this week’s featured properties:
In Spuyten Duyvil: a three-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bath, 1,995-square-foot duplex apartment with a living room that has a fireplace, an eat-in kitchen with an island, a bluestone balcony with entrances from the kitchen and living room, a bedroom-turned-home office with a washer and dryer, a finished attic, casement windows, hardwood floors and a finished attic, in a 17-unit, prewar non-doorman walk-up building.
In Yorkville: a three-bedroom, three-bath, 1,500-square-foot prewar apartment with a living room that has a built-in bookcase, a dining area, a windowed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a bedroom with a built-in desk serving as a home office, three exposures and stained hardwood floors, on the 12th floor of a 16-story doorman elevator building with a live-in superintendent and a basement laundry room.
